org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core

Class ThreadPoolProvider<T extends Data,S extends Data>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.Provider<T,S>
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.AndroidProvider<T,S>
        • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.AsyncProvider<T,S>
          • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.ThreadPoolProvider<T,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the input data
    S - type of the output data
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnekaProvider, EdgeLensProvider

    public abstract class ThreadPoolProvider<T extends Data,S extends Data>
extends AsyncProvider<T,S>
    AsyncProvider that uses a dedicated Executors.newFixedThreadPool(int) for scheduling its tasks. As a result, tasks will be executed in parallel, up to a maximum of nThreads, as set in ThreadPoolProvider(int, Class, Class). Exceeding tasks will be queued waiting for the running tasks to complete their execution.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini
    See Also:
    Executors.newFixedThreadPool(int), SequentialProvider
